languages.text: "Изгой, ты не задумывалась о том, почему Аребенниан решил особо указать тебе путь к твоим провидцам? Не боишься часа, когда он придет за наградой за свою помощь?"
"Outcast, have you ever wondered why the Arebennian chose to direct you toward your Farseers? Do you not dread the hour when he will return to claim the reward for his aid?"
languages.original_text: "Изгой, ты не задумывалась о том, почему Аребенниан решил особо указать тебе путь к твоим провидцам? Не боишься часа, когда он придет за наградой за свою помощь?"

traits.locale_text: "Outcast, have you ever wondered why the Arebennian chose to direct you toward your Farseers? Do you not dread the hour when he will return to claim the reward for his aid?"
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Outcast, have you ever wondered why the Arebennian chose to direct you toward your Farseers? Do you not dread the hour when he will return to claim the reward for his aid?"
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: “流浪者，你有没有想过为什么独角选择指引你去见你的先知？难道你不害怕，他会回过头为他提供的帮助索要报酬吗？”
languages.original_text: "Outcast, have you ever wondered why the Arebennian chose to direct you toward your Farseers? Do you not dread the hour when he will return to claim the reward for his aid?"

traits.locale_text: “流浪者，你有没有想过为什么独角选择指引你去见你的先知？难道你不害怕，他会回过头为他提供的帮助索要报酬吗？”
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: « Errante, vous êtes vous jamais demandé pourquoi l'Arebennian vous avait indiqué où trouver vos Grands Prophètes ? Ne craignez-vous pas le moment où il viendra exiger rétribution pour son aide ? »
languages.original_text: "Outcast, have you ever wondered why the Arebennian chose to direct you toward your Farseers? Do you not dread the hour when he will return to claim the reward for his aid?"

traits.locale_text: « Errante, vous êtes vous jamais demandé pourquoi l'arebennian vous avait indiqué où trouver vos Grands Prophètes ? Ne craignez-vous pas le moment où il viendra exiger rétribution pour son aide ? »
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: «Proscrita, ¿no te preguntas por qué el Arebennian eligió enviarte a los videntes? ¿No temes la hora en la que decida cobrarse el precio de su ayuda?».
languages.original_text: "Outcast, have you ever wondered why the Arebennian chose to direct you toward your Farseers? Do you not dread the hour when he will return to claim the reward for his aid?"

traits.locale_text: «Proscrita, ¿no te preguntas por qué el Arebennian eligió enviarte a los videntes? ¿No temes la hora en la que decida cobrarse el precio de su ayuda?».
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: 「追放者、アーベニアンがなんでお前を先見司のとこに案内したのか考えたことはあるか？奴が援助の見返りを求める時を恐れてないのか？」
languages.original_text: "Outcast, have you ever wondered why the Arebennian chose to direct you toward your Farseers? Do you not dread the hour when he will return to claim the reward for his aid?"

traits.locale_text: 「追放者、アーベニアンがなんでお前を先見司のとこに案内したのか考えたことはあるか？奴が援助の見返りを求める時を恐れてないのか？」
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: "Ausgestoßene, habt Ihr Euch je gefragt, warum der Arebennian entschieden hat, Euch zu Euren Runenpropheten zu schicken? Fürchtet Ihr nicht die Stunde, in der er zurückkehrt, um die Belohnung für seine Hilfe einzufordern?"
languages.original_text: "Outcast, have you ever wondered why the Arebennian chose to direct you toward your Farseers? Do you not dread the hour when he will return to claim the reward for his aid?"

traits.locale_text: "Ausgestoßene, habt Ihr Euch je gefragt, warum der Arebennian entschieden hat, Euch zu Euren Runenpropheten zu schicken? Fürchtet Ihr nicht die Stunde, in der er zurückkehrt, um die Belohnung für seine Hilfe einzufordern?"
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.original_text: "Outcast, have you ever wondered why the Arebennian chose to direct you toward your Farseers? Do you not dread the hour when he will return to claim the reward for his aid?"

languages.text: "Arebennian'ın neden seni Ötesezenlere yönlendirdiğini hiç merak etmedin mi Yurtsuz? Yardımlarının karşılığını almak için döneceği an, kâbuslarına girmiyor mu?"
languages.original_text: "Outcast, have you ever wondered why the Arebennian chose to direct you toward your Farseers? Do you not dread the hour when he will return to claim the reward for his aid?"

traits.locale_text: "Arebennian'ın neden seni Ötesezenlere yönlendirdiğini hiç merak etmedin mi Yurtsuz? Yardımlarının karşılığını almak için döneceği an kâbusun olmuyor mu?"
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion
